tickets.title: Login page not working
tickets.description: The login page returns a 500 error when I try to log in.

tickets.title: Feature request: Dark mode
tickets.description: Can we add a dark mode option to the application?

tickets.title: Payment gateway issue
tickets.description: Unable to process payments using credit cards.

tickets.title: Profile picture upload failed
tickets.description: Profile picture upload is failing with a 403 error.

tickets.title: Bug in the dashboard graph rendering
tickets.description: The graphs in the dashboard are not showing data for the last week.

tickets.title: Cancelled subscription issue
tickets.description: I am still being charged after cancelling my subscription.

tickets.title: Email notification not received
tickets.description: I did not receive the email notification for the password reset.

tickets.title: Search functionality broken
tickets.description: The search feature on the website is returning no results.

tickets.title: User profile page not loading
tickets.description: The user profile page is not loading properly after the update.

tickets.title: API rate limit exceeded
tickets.description: The application is hitting the API rate limit too frequently.

tickets.title: Error in user registration
tickets.description: New users are encountering an error during the registration process.

tickets.title: Broken link on homepage
tickets.description: There is a broken link on the homepage that needs fixing.

tickets.title: Data export feature not working
tickets.description: The data export feature is not generating files correctly.

tickets.title: Issues with mobile responsiveness
tickets.description: The site is not responsive on mobile devices.

tickets.title: Form submission error
tickets.description: The form submission on the contact page is returning an error.

tickets.title: Database connection issue
tickets.description: The application is experiencing intermittent database connection issues.

tickets.title: Incorrect user permissions
tickets.description: Some users are seeing restricted content that should be accessible.

tickets.title: Timeout on data retrieval
tickets.description: Retrieving large datasets is timing out and failing.

tickets.title: Authentication failure
tickets.description: Users are unable to authenticate with their accounts.

tickets.title: Visual glitch on checkout page
tickets.description: There is a visual glitch on the checkout page that affects user experience.
